description: Luffy defeats the Kraken in battle and then tames it through intimidation and charisma, naming it Surume. The Kraken becomes a temporary ally.

evolutionMoments.description: After being defeated by Luffy's Elephant Gun, the Kraken is intimidated and tamed, becoming Luffy's ally.

significance: Demonstrates Luffy's natural ability to win over even fearsome creatures through strength and charisma.
